QuestData.Title: Demon Duty
QuestData.Description: Listen, $c, I know this assault on Splintertree has everyone worked up, but if we forget about the satyr portals we'll come out of this crisis to face an even larger one.$b$b<Locke stares at your expressionless face.>$b$bYou don't know about the portals?$b$bTo the northeast, in the regions of Satyrnaar and Xavian, the satyrs are attempting to summon in demons to bolster their numbers.$b$bWe must be vigilant in closing those portals, no matter what issues we face here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Locke Okarr in Splintertree wants you to close 12 Satyr Portals in Satyrnaar and Xavian.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to close the satyr portals, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $r.$b$bOne less thing we have to worry about!
